name: Flappy Alien - Tap To Fly
description:
Flap your wings to fly! If you're a fan of Flappy Bird you'll love this game: Flap the little wings of the cute alien in this thrilling and action packed flying adventure. Flappy Alien is a fun side-scrolling game featuring stunning 2D graphics.

Game Features:

Simple one touch controls: touch to flap the wings.
Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master.
